channel.title: what is necessary for me to play BMS?
channel.description: Hello to you all, I would like to know which programs are necessary for the Black Mesa Source can run without problem, only the programs that you use that are using it

item.title: what is necessary for me to play BMS?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
There’s a wiki and FAQ for this.
Steam.
Source SDK 2007 Base (Tools tab under Library in Steam)
That’s it.

Read full topic
